scripts.production: node_modules/.bin/parcel build index.jsx --out-file aweza-popup.min.js && node_modules/.bin/csso style.css --output dist/aweza-popup.min.css
scripts.dev: node_modules/.bin/parcel --no-hmr index.jsx --out-file aweza-popup.js && node_modules/.bin/csso style.css --output dist/aweza-popup.css
